span.span: district will be serving meals for the weekends until the end of the school year. These will be given out on Fridays and will begin on April 17th. The sack given out will consist of Friday’s, Saturday’s, and Sunday’s breakfast and lunch.
As a result of the district being able to resume weekend feeding next week, Bill’s Backpacks will not be distributed until further notice.
Meals will be handed out from 11:30 am-1:00 pm and can be picked up at Capitol Elementary, Intermediate School, and High School.
As always, we will continue to keep you informed should any other changes occur.

br.h1: Home of the Lobos and Loboettes

div.p:
Levelland ISD strives to provide a path to academic success for all students. We recognize every student is unique and will have a different path and pace for learning.
Our Vision Statement:
LISD envisions classrooms that support learning for all and students who are ready to learn each day.
